get.description: Retrieves paginated collections for the current user.

post.description: Creates a named collection for the current user.FeedURL@Tags         Collections
Adds an item to the specified collection.

delete.description: Removes the specified item from the collection.

get.description: Retrieves items in the collection, including like status.
Returns all feeds or only those the user is subscribed to.

parameters.description: Max number of feeds to return
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Creates a new feed from URL or subscribes the user to it.

get.description: Returns a CSV list of all feeds, or only those the user is subscribed to.
Retrieves a feed by ID, including the user’s subscription status.

delete.description: Removes a feed and all its subscriptions/items.

put.description: Subscribes the user to an existing feed.

delete.description: Removes the user’s subscription to a feed.

get.description: Retrieves items liked by the user, paginated.
Retrieves an item by ID, including like status for the user.
Retrieves list of collections that given item is in.

post.description: Creates a like record for the current user on an item.

delete.description: Deletes the like record for the current user on an item.

get.description: Retrieves paginated list of similiar items.
Retrieves subscribed items for user, paginated.
Retrieves suggested items for user, paginated.
